lead_paragraph: Several people were charged with a beating in the state of Karnataka, one in a series of attacks against those suspected of killing cows, which are sacred in Hinduism.

headline.print_headline: Slaughtered Cow in India Leads to More Accusations of Hindu Vigilantism
headline.main: Slaughtered Cow Leads to More Vigilantism Accusations in India

snippet: Several people were charged with a beating in the state of Karnataka, one in a series of attacks against those suspected of killing cows, which are sacred in Hinduism....
abstract: Vigilantes descend on house in Shantipura, India, and allegedly beat several men suspected of slaughtering cow, animal sacred in Hinduism; men accused of cow slaughter belong to Dalit community, lowest rung of India’s outlawed caste system, while some attackers belong to Hindu militant Bajrang Dal organization.
